resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR DiagnosticReport
resource.description: A DiagnosticReport Profile meant to capture what should be represented in a report parsed from an IHE SDC Form

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR DocumentReference
resource.description: A DocumentReference Profile meant to share an IHE SDC Form whether completed or blank

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation ListItemResponse Date
resource.description: This Observation Profile is mean to capture Single or Multiselect answers as a valueCodeableConcept with additional date fill in answers in an Observation.component.valueDate

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation ListItemResponse Integer
resource.description: This Observation Profile is mean to capture Single or Multiselect answers as a valueCodeableConcept with additional integer fill in answers in an Observation.component.valueInteger

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation ListItemResponse Quantity
resource.description: This Observation Profile is mean to capture Single or Multiselect answers as a valueCodeableConcept with additional quantity fill in answers in an Observation.component.valueQuantity

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation ListItemResponse String
resource.description: This Observation Profile is mean to capture Single or Multiselect answers as a valueCodeableConcept with additional text fill in answers in an Observation.component.valueString

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation Date
resource.description: A Observation Profile meant to capture date Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Any answer that has a date datatype in IHE SDC should be represented using this profile which requires the Observation.valueDateTime

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation Single Select
resource.description: This Observation Profile is mean to capture single select Question-Answer Pairs as a valueCodeableConcept. If the question is Multiselect multiple Observations with the same Question Code may be created

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation
resource.description: A Observation Profile meant to capture integer Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Any answer that has an integer datatype in IHE SDC should be represented using this profile which requires the Observation.valueInteger

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation
resource.description: A Observation Profile meant to capture quantity Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Any answer that has a quantity datatype in IHE SDC, or any datatype requiring a UCUM unit should be represented using this profile which requires the Observation.valueQuantity

resource.name: IHE SDC/eCC on FHIR Observation Text
resource.description: A Observation Profile meant to capture text Question and Answer Sets from an IHE SDC Form. Any answer that has a string datatype in IHE SDC should be represented using this profile which requires the Observation.valueString

resource.name: SDCeCCObservationCodeEx
resource.description: Example Observation using codes from SDC

resource.name: SDCeCCObservationStringEx
resource.description: Example Observation using text fill in from SDC

resource.name: SDC eCC DocumentReference
resource.description: Example DocumentReference with eCC attached as URL
